name: Coots in Boots
description:
Description

Play as Coots as she journeys to find Ludwig. Along the way, you'll have to fight Melee-inspired Yard members whose own goal is to kidnap and keep Coots. With mechanics inspired by Hollow Knight, fight your way back to Ludwig!

Recommended to play in full screen!

Controls

WASD or the ARROW KEYS for moving left and right and for directional attacks. 

SPACE or J to jump.

SHIFT or CTRL to perform a dash.

X or K, or LEFT CLICK to attack.

Pressing UP/W or DOWN/S during an attack will let you attack upwards or downwards respectively.

Made for Ludwig Jam 2023

Collaborators

orz- programming, art, music/sound

cheep- programming

oni/largeonions- art
